name: sumo-helper-monorepo
description: SUMO Helper - Web-based traffic simulation tool

scripts.dev:backend: cd backend && . venv/bin/activate && python -m uvicorn main:app --reload --port 8000
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && cd backend && python setup.py
